TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TrackingProfileSerializer extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 提供通过使用跟踪配置文件 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 将跟踪配置文件序列化为 XML 文档或从 XML 文档反序列化跟踪配置文件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods to serialize and deserialize tracking profiles into and from XML documents by using the tracking profile XML schema definition (XSD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 使用 中包含的跟踪配置文件 XSD 将 对象序列化为有效的 XML 文档，并将有效的 XML 文档反序列化为 对象。The uses the tracking profile XSD contained in to serialize objects into valid XML documents and to deserialize valid XML documents into objects. 在序列化和反序列化过程中执行验证，并在必要时引发适当的异常。The performs validation during both serialization and deserialization and, if necessary, throws an appropriate exception. XML 文档提供了一种用于存储跟踪配置文件的方便格式。An XML document provides a convenient format in which to store a tracking profile. 它还提供了一种编写跟踪配置文件的非编程方式。It also provides a non-programmatic way of authoring tracking profiles. 现成可用的 使用 来序列化和反序列化存储在其数据库中的跟踪配置文件。The out-of-box uses a to serialize and deserialize the tracking profiles that are stored in its database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数创建 ，以便序列化 。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor to serialize a . 代码还使用 方法。The code also uses the method. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“使用 SQLTrackingService 查询”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 SQLTrackingService 查询](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90)). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#291](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#291)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#291](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#291)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile Deserialize(class System.IO.TextReader reader) cil managed
Public Function Deserialize (reader As TextReader) As TrackingProfile

span.span: A that contains an XML document.

summary.span: 通过使用跟踪配置文件 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 反序列化包含在文本阅读器中的 XML 文档。

span.span: Deserializes the XML document that is contained in the text reader by using the tracking profile XML Schema definition (XSD).

returns.span: 包含反序列化的跟踪配置文件的 。

span.span: A that contains the deserialized tracking profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 反序列化是指依据格式良好的 XML 文档创建对象的过程。Deserialization refers to the process of creating an object from a well-formed XML document. 使用 中包含的跟踪配置文件 XSD 将包含在文本阅读器中的 XML 文档反序列化为有效的 。 uses the tracking profile XSD contained in to deserialize the XML document that is contained in the text reader into a valid . XML 文档验证是在反序列化过程中执行的，并且，如果文档无效，则会引发 。Validation on the XML document is performed during deserialization, and, if the document is not valid, a is thrown. 您可以捕获此异常，并检查 来确定验证错误的原因。You can catch this exception and examine to determine the cause of the validation error. 如果在反序列化跟踪配置文件时出现任何未经处理的异常，为其请求跟踪配置文件的工作流实例将终止。If there are any unhandled exceptions while deserializing the tracking profile then the workflow instance for which the tracking profile was requested will be terminated. > [!NOTE] > 如果要执行验证而不反序列化跟踪配置文件的 XML 表示形式，您可以编写自己的跟踪配置文件验证程序。If you want to perform validation without deserializing the XML representation of a tracking profile, you can write your own tracking profile validator. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。See the property for more information.

exception.span: 为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

exception.span: 不包含符合跟踪配置文件 XSD 的文档。

span.span: does not contain a document that conforms to the tracking profile XSD.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Schema As XmlSchema
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchema ^ Schema { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchema ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取跟踪配置文件 XML 架构定义 (XSD)。

span.span: Gets the tracking profile XML schema definition (XSD).
The tracking profile XSD.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性公开 用于执行 序列化和反序列化的跟踪配置文件 XSD。This property exposes the tracking profile XSD used by the to perform serialization and deserialization of a . 还可以使用此属性来获取跟踪配置文件 XSD，以便编写自己的验证程序来跟踪配置文件。You may also use this property to get the tracking profile XSD in order to write your own validator for tracking profiles. 例如，您可能需要这样做以便在不执行反序列化的情况下验证跟踪配置文件的 XML 表示形式。For example, you may want to do this in order to validate XML representations of tracking profiles without performing deserialization.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Serialize(class System.IO.TextWriter writer, class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile profile) cil managed
Public Sub Serialize (writer As TextWriter, profile As TrackingProfile)

summary.span: 通过使用跟踪配置文件 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 将跟踪配置文件序列化为 XML 文档。

span.span: Serializes the tracking profile into an XML document by using the tracking profile XML Schema definition (XSD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化是指依据有效的 创建格式良好的 XML 文档的过程。Serialization refers to the process of creating a well-formed XML document from a valid . 使用跟踪配置文件 来序列化跟踪配置文件。 uses the tracking profile to serialize the tracking profile. `profile` 必须是包含至少一个有效跟踪点的有效 。`profile` must be a valid that contains at least one valid track point. 跟踪配置文件验证是在序列化过程中执行的，并且，如果跟踪配置文件无效，则会引发 。Validation on the tracking profile is performed during serialization, and, if the tracking profile is not valid, an is thrown. 您可以捕获此异常，并检查其消息属性来确定验证错误的原因。You can catch this exception and examine its message property to determine the cause of the validation error. 如果在序列化跟踪配置文件时出现任何未经处理的异常，为其请求跟踪配置文件的工作流实例将终止。If there are any unhandled exceptions while serializing the tracking profile, then the workflow instance for which the tracking profile was requested is terminated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数创建 ，以便序列化 。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor to serialize a . 代码还使用 方法。The code also uses the method. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“使用 SQLTrackingService 查询”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 SQLTrackingService 查询](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90)).
